article.title: Lockheed to Support Optic Sensors in Afghanistan
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Gyrocam Systems L.L.C., Sarasota, Fla., was awarded an $11,036,550 firm-fixed-price contract for vehicle optics sensor systems and support services. Work will be performed in Sarasota; Afghanistan; and Fort Leonard Wood, Mo.; with an estimated completion date of May 30, 2013. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Alexandria, Va., is the contracting activity.
